dt: {bc}combining characteristics of more than one kind
{bc}combining features of two or more systems of government
{bc}made up of or involving individuals or items of more than one kind: such as
{bc}made up of or involving persons differing in race {dx_def}see {dxt|race:1||1a}{/dx_def}, national origin, religion, or class
{bc}made up of or involving individuals of more than one sex
{bc}including or accompanied by inconsistent, incompatible, or contrary elements

shortdef: combining characteristics of more than one kind; specifically : combining features of two or more systems of government
made up of or involving individuals or items of more than one kind: such as
made up of or involving persons differing in race, national origin, religion, or class

dt: {bc}to combine or blend into one mass
{bc}to produce (a sound recording) by electronically combining or adjusting sounds from more than one source

dt.t: {wi}mixes{/wi} things up in his eagerness to speak out

dt: {bc}to engage in a fight, contest, or dispute

pt: {sc}mix{/sc} {sc}mingle{/sc} {sc}commingle{/sc} {sc}blend{/sc} {sc}merge{/sc} {sc}coalesce{/sc} {sc}amalgamate{/sc} {sc}fuse{/sc} mean to combine into a more or less uniform whole. {sc}mix{/sc} may or may not imply loss of each element's identity.
{sc}mingle{/sc} usually suggests that the elements are still somewhat distinguishable or separately active.

pt.t: fear {it}mingled{/it} with anticipation in my mind

pt: {sc}commingle{/sc} implies a closer or more thorough mingling.

pt.t: a sense of duty {it}commingled{/it} with a fierce pride drove her

pt: {sc}blend{/sc} implies that the elements as such disappear in the resulting mixture.

pt.t: {it}blended{/it} several teas to create a balanced flavor

pt: {sc}merge{/sc} suggests a combining in which one or more elements are lost in the whole.

pt.t: in his mind reality and fantasy {it}merged{/it}

pt: {sc}coalesce{/sc} implies an affinity in the merging elements and usually a resulting organic unity.

pt.t: telling details that {it}coalesce{/it} into a striking portrait

pt: {sc}amalgamate{/sc} implies the forming of a close union without complete loss of individual identities.

pt.t: refugees who were readily {it}amalgamated{/it} into the community

pt: {sc}fuse{/sc} stresses oneness and indissolubility of the resulting product.

pt.t: a building in which modernism and classicism are {it}fused{/it}

et: Middle English, back-formation from {it}mixte{/it} mixed, from Anglo-French, from Latin {it}mixtus{/it}, past participle of {it}miscēre{/it} to mix; akin to Greek {it}mignynai{/it} to mix
shortdef: to combine or blend into one mass

dt: {bc}an alphabet (as in a cryptographic system) that has been rearranged or disordered systematically or randomly

shortdef: an alphabet (as in a cryptographic system) that has been rearranged or disordered systematically or randomly

dt: {bc}one having both positive and negative qualities or aspects

shortdef: one having both positive and negative qualities or aspects

dt: {bc}a bud that produces a branch and leaves as well as flowers

shortdef: a bud that produces a branch and leaves as well as flowers

dt: {bc}the growing of food or cash crops, feed crops, and livestock on the same farm

shortdef: the growing of food or cash crops, feed crops, and livestock on the same farm

dt: {bc}meats (such as lamb chop, kidney, and bacon) and vegetables broiled together and served on one plate

shortdef: meats (such as lamb chop, kidney, and bacon) and vegetables broiled together and served on one plate

dt: {bc}a marriage between people of different races {dx_def}see {dxt|race:1||1a}{/dx_def} or religions

shortdef: a marriage between people of different races or religions

dt: {bc}a contact sport that allows a wide range of fighting techniques including striking, kicking, and grappling

shortdef: a contact sport that allows a wide range of fighting techniques including striking, kicking, and grappling
